title: New Store > Champions Automatically Showing Owned
body:
Whenever I click on the champions tab in the store it defaults to "show owned" which is quite annoying because I'm not going to buy champions I already own. Anyway a small quality of life change would be that it defaults to "show owned" being turned off. I feel like more people are going to go to the store to see new champions they don't have instead of ones they already own.

Thoughts?

replies.body: I totally agree, defaulting to show owned is bloody stupid imo. And its not just the champions, skins, icons, runes etc all default to show owned. Get it together rito.
